name: My Very Own World (Crimzoth)
description:
Game created in 48 hours during Ludum Dare 38!

A simple turnbased strategy game with intriguing biome mechanics and a "twist" to it's presentation.

It is my first time on Ludum Dare. I had lots of fun.

Ludum Dare page: goo.gl/iHwrgL

----------------------------------

Instructions:

- You control the red

- A/D - scroll map

- L Click - select unit/city

- R Click - move selected unit

- Esc - pause menu

- UI - build unit / build city / destroy city

----------------------------------

Tools:

- Unity 5.5

- Visual Studio Community 2015

- Gimp 2.8

- Blender 2.77

- LMMS 1.1.3

- Audacity

- Ample Guitar
